chunks.text:
Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:41:34
Folder: CHB1SH4 - 5 days remaining to set your goals!
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CHB1SH4_00
From: Performance Management <performance.management@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-24 13:59
Subject: 5 days remaining to set your goals!
--------------------------------------------------
Hello,

With the Goal Setting deadline of 31st March 2025 fast approaching, we note that you still have either no goals in the system, or goals not equating to 100%.

 

Once this deadline has passed, the system will close, and you will not be able to make any changes until mid-year (June to August).

 

As a best practice, aim to have 4-8 goals on Drive, with a total weightage of 100%. Ensure that your goals encompass the ultimate success you aim to achieve by the end of the year (think goals, not tasks!).


ðŸ”¹ Resources to help you get started:

Performance Management Team
